name: The Investor Who Sees The Future
author: Pine
content: After experiencing an accident in the military, Kang Jinhu gained the ability to foresee the future. He decides to use this ability to invest in various companies and make money, aiming to become the world&#039s number one investor. How far do the limits of his foresight extend? Beyond investments, it touches economics, politics, corporations, and even global affairs. From now on, heâ€™s reshaping the world of finance!
